Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3998 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.35-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-3998 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.35-7. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package glibc is earlier than 2.35-7, affected by CVE-2021-3998
